00090 /* general signal that's in output sockets, and goes over the wires */
00091 typedef struct CompBuf {
00092     float *rect;
00093     int x, y, xrad, yrad;
00094     short type, malloc;
00095     rcti disprect;      /* cropped part of image */
00096     int xof, yof;       /* relative to center of target image */
00097     
00098     void (*rect_procedural)(struct CompBuf *, float *, float, float);
00099     float procedural_size[3], procedural_offset[3];
00100     int procedural_type;
00101     bNode *node;        /* only in use for procedural bufs */
00102     
00103     struct CompBuf *next, *prev;    /* for pass-on, works nicer than reference counting */
00104 } CompBuf;
00105

00179 /* utility functions used by glare, tonemap and lens distortion */
00180 /* soms macros for color handling */
00181 typedef float fRGB[4];
00182 /* clear color */
00183 #define fRGB_clear(c) { c[0]=c[1]=c[2]=0.f; }
00184 /* copy c2 to c1 */
00185 #define fRGB_copy(c1, c2) { c1[0]=c2[0];  c1[1]=c2[1];  c1[2]=c2[2]; c1[3]=c2[3]; }
00186 /* add c2 to c1 */
00187 #define fRGB_add(c1, c2) { c1[0]+=c2[0];  c1[1]+=c2[1];  c1[2]+=c2[2]; }
00188 /* subtract c2 from c1 */
00189 #define fRGB_sub(c1, c2) { c1[0]-=c2[0];  c1[1]-=c2[1];  c1[2]-=c2[2]; }
00190 /* multiply c by float value s */
00191 #define fRGB_mult(c, s) { c[0]*=s;  c[1]*=s;  c[2]*=s; }
00192 /* multiply c2 by s and add to c1 */
00193 #define fRGB_madd(c1, c2, s) { c1[0]+=c2[0]*s;  c1[1]+=c2[1]*s;  c1[2]+=c2[2]*s; }
00194 /* multiply c2 by color c1 */
00195 #define fRGB_colormult(c, cs) { c[0]*=cs[0];  c[1]*=cs[1];  c[2]*=cs[2]; }
00196 /* multiply c2 by color c3 and add to c1 */
00197 #define fRGB_colormadd(c1, c2, c3) { c1[0]+=c2[0]*c3[0];  c1[1]+=c2[1]*c3[1];  c1[2]+=c2[2]*c3[2]; }
00198 /* multiply c2 by color rgb, rgb as separate arguments */
00199 #define fRGB_rgbmult(c, r, g, b) { c[0]*=(r);  c[1]*=(g);  c[2]*=(b); }
00200 /* swap colors c1 & c2 */
00201 #define fRGB_swap(c1, c2) { float _t=c1[0];  c1[0]=c2[0];  c2[0]=_t;\
00202                                   _t=c1[1];  c1[1]=c2[1];  c2[1]=_t;\
00203                                   _t=c1[2];  c1[2]=c2[2];  c2[2]=_t;\
00204                                   _t=c1[3];  c1[3]=c2[3];  c3[3]=_t;}
00205 
00206 void qd_getPixel(CompBuf* src, int x, int y, float* col);
00207 void qd_setPixel(CompBuf* src, int x, int y, float* col);
00208 void qd_addPixel(CompBuf* src, int x, int y, float* col);

00213 CompBuf* qd_downScaledCopy(CompBuf* src, int scale);
00214 void IIR_gauss(CompBuf* src, float sigma, int chan, int xy);
